description: This integrative seminar focuses on the pursuit of research, the explanation of research to fellow students and the exploration of connections among diverse approaches to the selected topic, which changes annually. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisite: BTS-B. Spring 2009: Law & Spirit.
name: Th Sem: Law and Spirit
notes: Open to Seniors and Juniors only. Open to Seniors only Passes 1 and 2. Open to Juniors beginning with Pass 3.
title: Thematic Seminar
